allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update code samples to use LangChain and Agent Framework

- learning-adaptation: Update Reflexion examples to use LangChain \(Python\)
  and Microsoft Agent Framework \(C#\)
- context-engineering: Update ConversationCompressor and IsolatedContextAgent
  to use LangChain/Agent Framework
- context-bloat: Update NeedleInHaystackTest and ContextMitigationPipeline
  to use LangChain/Agent Framework

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code guidance

Includes project overview, commands, architecture, and code sample standards.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
